name: @aragon/kits-bare
description: Generic kit for deploying and setting up a DAO with one app
author: Aragon One AG <contact@aragon.one>

scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish $(npm run deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --network rpc
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile --network rpc && aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/deploy.js
